reviews.customers_say: Customers find these underwear comfortable with soft lace edges that don't itch, and appreciate their perfect cotton material and good fit. They receive positive feedback for their appearance and quality, with one customer noting they're comparable to higher-end underwear. The durability and sizing receive mixed reviews - while some say the fabric is holding up well, others report the lace parts coming apart, and whi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, breathable and so cute!
items.body: I adore these panties! Theyâ€™re the softest cotton, fit well and breathable. Not only are they comfortable, but theyâ€™re so cute! These are the first underwear Iâ€™ve had in years that I love. Iâ€™m curvy below the waist and these fit my body great. The elastic is very soft and doesnâ€™t bite into my skin. I have no issues with them bunching up or giving me wedgies. Because theyâ€™re thin and not bulky, theyâ€™d be great to wear in snug jeans or pants. Theyâ€™re quality and sewn well with finished seams in the crotch panel. They have held up well to washing and the lace detail looks just as pretty as when they were brand new. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars WORTH THE BUYYY!!

items.author: Megan Rodriguez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big booty Judys rejoice!
items.body: My favorites! Why? 1- comfy & cute 2- I have been blessed with a lot of junk in the trunk and these cover enough to show off a little cheek. 3- I sleep like a weirdo. ((That might not seem relevant, but let me tell you why it is)) These bad boys do NOT ride up my butt when I sleep in a mountain climber position. Read more
items.author: HoneyB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy and Comfy
items.body: Purchased from my ex girlfriend. It was sexy on her. Loved taking them off of her. They were great 'booty shorts'. She always spoke about how comfy they were as well. Read more
items.author: Ryan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fabric quality isnâ€™t great, but covers what it needs to
items.body: Decent at first but the fabric is really cheap quality. I take very good care of my undergarments and these underwear do not stand the test of â€timeâ€, unfortunately. All the pairs were great for about 3 monthsâ€™ worth of washing (on delicate cycles, either air dry or delicate cycle on dryer too). After that, it seems overnight they have become the durability of paper underwear. 2 of the pairs from this set literally tore in my hands as I was pulling them on. Like the actual fabric theyâ€™re made of just ripped open as I was pulling up, not even at the seams! Every pair has at least one hole where the lace meets the fabric, just from normal washing. Overall theyâ€™re cheap, they get the job done and they are comfortable for a quarter of a year. If youâ€™re not looking for any type of â€œlongevityâ€ in your undergarments, Iâ€™d search elsewhere. These will not last. I know underwear isnâ€™t meant to stay perfect and get passed down to your grandkids as an antique or what have you, but my goodness it should be able to last more than just a few months! Read more
items.author: Jenna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it!
items.body: Great ! Absolutely love the made well and true to fit .ðŸ˜Šâ¤ï¸ Read more

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Multicolored N,5 Pack, Multicolored E,5 Pack, Multicolored I,5 Pack, Multicolored D,5 Pack, Multicolored F,5 Pack, Multicolored H,5 Pack. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
